content.text: Hey there! I never used this before so I don't know what to expect
I'm going to use a pseudonym. I'm called Dragon. What's your name?
I'm called Koala. It's nice to meet you Dragon
Nice to meet you too Koala. I've never been to Australia. Where are you from?
I'm not from Australia. I'm from a small town in the United States.
Oh, how interesting. I've never been to the United States. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to write. I also like to connect with people and make them feel good about themselves.
That's a nice thing to do. What are you writing about now?
I'm writing a novel about a young woman who goes on an adventure.
That sounds interesting. I'd love to read it when it's finished.
Thanks, I'll send you a copy when it's done.
Great! Do you have any pets?
No, I don't have any pets.
I have a pet fox. He's a lot of fun.
A pet fox? That's interesting. What's his name?
His name is Sparky. He's a very friendly fox.
I'm sure he is. I've never met a fox before.
You should come visit me and meet Sparky. He's a great friend.
